mapper.insert: insert into travel_location(user_id, country_a, country_b, country_c, country_detail, country_script, country_img) values (#{user_id}, #{country_a}, #{country_b}, #{country_c}, #{country_detail}, #{country_script}, #{country_img})
mapper.select: select travel_location_idx, user_id, country_a, country_b, country_c, country_detail, country_script, country_img, create_date, update_date from travel_location where travel_location_idx = #{travel_location_idx}

select travel_location_idx, user_id, country_a, country_b, country_c, country_detail, country_script, create_date, update_date from travel_location where country_a like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') country_b like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') country_c like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') country_detail like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') country_script like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') 1=1 order by travel_location_idx desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

select count(travel_location_idx) from travel_location where country_a like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') country_b like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') country_c like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') country_detail like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') country_script like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') 1=1
